content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crossbow
inventory=[{"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a crossbow, I first need to craft the acacia_planks. To craft the acacia_planks, I need to move the stripped_acacia_wood from slot 38 to the crafting table. I will place the stripped_acacia_wood in slot 1, since it is the first free slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crossbow
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the acacia_planks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can craft the sticks.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
